text: Leposternon cerradensis is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in Brazil. ==References== Category:Leposternon Category:Reptiles described in 2008 Category:Taxa named by Síria Ribeiro Category:Taxa named by Wilian Vaz-Silva Category:Taxa named by Alfredo P. Santos Jr. Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Brazil
title: Leposternon cerradensis
